DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Pulsed Dye Laser therapy are effective in the treatment of Cutaneous Dermatophytosis.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy of Pulsed Dye Laser in Dermatophytosis
DOC.detailed_description: This study was conducted to determine the efficacy of Pulse Dye Laser in skin fungal infection, if this study showed that Laser could be effective, this would be introduced as a new treatment modality.
DOC.criteria: Patients with Positive KOH Smear skin plaques Tinea Capitis,Onychomycosis Pregnancy and feeding
